title: Summoner 8
description: As Gryff learns more about the Shadowscape and the god-like Archons that rule it, the stakes keep getting higher.  The angel-monster Phi is still hellbent on destroying humanity, so Gryff and his friends must spread out to the far corners of Mistral to make sure she doesnâ€™t succeed.  And then they must end her. Once and for all.
author: Eric Vall
